bibliography:
Aczel, P., 1978, ‘The type-theoretic interpretation of

55–66.

van Atten, M., 2004, On Brouwer, Belmont:
Wadsworth/Thomson Learning.

–––, 2007, Brouwer meets Husserl: On the

–––, 2008, ‘On the hypothetical judgement

Brouwer, L.E.J., 1975, Collected works I, A. Heyting

–––, 1976, Collected works II, H.
Freudenthal (ed.), Amsterdam: North-Holland.

–––, 1905, Leven, kunst en mystiek,
Delft: Waltman.

–––, 1907, Over de grondslagen der
wiskunde, Ph.D. Thesis, University of Amsterdam, Department of

–––, 1912, ‘Intuïtionisme en

–––, 1925, ‘Zur Begründung der

–––, 1925, ‘Zur Begründung der

–––, 1952, ‘Historical background,

–––, 1953, ‘Points and Spaces,’

–––, 1981, Brouwer’s Cambridge

–––, 1992, Intuitionismus, D. van Dalen

Brouwer, L.E.J. and C.S. Adama van Scheltema, 1984, Droeve
